modName: The Skaven - A Warhammer fantasy race mod resource
summary:
This was just a little resource a friend and I made, they use the Riekling skeleton, but they're ratmen other than lil Goblins. Includes the Horned Rat and Rat Ogre from Warhammer Fantasy!

Just updated!
descriptionHtml:
*Requires Dragonborn*
This was just a little resource a friend and I made, they use the Riekling skeleton, but they're ratmen other than lil Goblins. Includes the Horned Rat and Rat Ogre from Warhammer Fantasy!

Note, this is a RESOURCE only with rudimentary implementation of the Skaven, you can add them via console commands:

Names for console spawning:
Rat Ogre = Bubba
Horned Rat = Squeakers the Unholy
Skaven Warrior
Skaven Archer

\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\
SKAVEN 2.0 UPDATE
\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\

This is a MASSSSSSSSSIVE update to my Skaven resource, this gives them quite a bit more varied types, including elite knights, Globadiers (gas bomb throwers), SKAVEN RIDERS, and various armor variations.  I asked Vicn permission especially to release these as a resource with his resources and he gave the okay.
TO SPAWN THE MONSTERS:
~
help "monster name"
Lists
Skaven Archer
Skaven Elite
Skaven Globadier
Squeakers the Unholy (two variants, mounted and normal)
Skaven Soldier
Skaven Assassin
Bubba
Little John
Ray
Hraughrrr
Skaven Warrior
Skaven Rider


*ALL HATS WERE MADE FROM SCRATCH AND VANILLA ASSETS EXCEPT FOR A FEW VICN ONES, WHICH I HAVE GIVEN CREDIT FOR*

CREDITS: 

VICN - for Riekling compatible clothes and armors
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65134/?
http://naaaaikikvicnvicn.blog.fc2.com/blog-entry-147.html

Haishao - For creating the Skaven meshes and porting LOADS of hats and armors for me, giving them animated mouths...also some textures.  Also teaching me Blender.  Also the gas bomb...pretty much 95% of the mod lol.  Thanks a ton, Hai! :D
author: Buffscale McThundertail and Haishao
